column1: English Sent: These mountain ranges run in a west-east direction from the Indus to the Brahmaputra.
Hindi Tansl: ye parvawa SqSMKalAez paScima-pUrva xiSA meM siMXu se lekara brahmapuwra waka PElI hEM.
Anu Translation:  ye parvawa_pafkwi SrqfKalA brahmaputra kI ora indasa se eka west-east xiSA meM xOde hue
